name: Banandit
description:
Banandit is a 3D game made by Protobox Games for Weekly Game Jam - Week 39.
The aim of the game is you the Banandit to steal all the paintings and escape the museum before the guards catch you!

This weeks theme: 'Take A Picture'

List of team:
Username: FrankmcFuzz
Role: Project lead, 3D Modeler
